name: Condemned to Die
description:
This is my Final Degree Project at Expert Technician in Video Game Creation The Game

"Condemned to Die"  is a  DEMO of a video game where you will play the role of a child who is trapped in a school. The child must advance through the different rooms following the game's instructions and try to complete it by solving the the different tests that are presented to him. At first glance, the objective of the game seems to be to overcome the escape room, but what you are really doing is to follow the different clues that another child has left you until you find it. The real story of this videogame tells how a bully gets locked up in a school and the boy who was being bullied has left him several clues with a specific objective.

Controls
  • WASD => Movement.
  • Mouse => Camera Movement.
  • Left Mouse Button => Interact with objects.
  • Right Mouse Button => Finish the interaction with the objects.
Features
  • The purpose of the game is to convey a series of messages to society, criticising issues such as bullying.
  • In addition, to awaken the players' minds and put them to the test through a series of puzzles that generate great difficulty.
How to play

The player will start the game inside a school, specifically in the school hallway. In this school he will find a series of puzzles and riddles that he will need to solve to be able to to be able to continue advancing in his objective. These puzzles consist of a series of padlocks whose passwords must be obtained through a series of riddles.
